document_data.name: Livikus Athantar
document_data.mainbody: '''Livikus Arthantar''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Bane]] and member of the [[Zhentarim]] in the early 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], Livikus and his bodyguard [[Xeldar Orsalyn]] were sent by his masters to the [[Xûl-Jarak]] citadel in [[Thar]] to pay homage to the new [[orog]] warlord [[Thrull]]. In truth, his mission was to determine if Thrull could truly unite all Thar and ally with [[Zhentil Keep]] in an attack on [[Melvaunt]].
document_data.Personality: Livikus truly believed in the possibility that [[Zhentil Keep]] would rule all of [[north Faerûn]].
